About_me: Pipeline engineer based in Rijswijk in the PFAS group.  Have suported many assets and pre-DG-3 projects with pipeline and flow assurance related questions.  Have supported Assets and Projects such as - NLNG condensate spiking, liquid mangement and Corrosion assesment - NLNG Pipeline Robustness Study, integrating robustness and additional capacity from the Onshore Pipeline network - NCOC Kazagstan Full Wellstream Pipeline concept devellopment. -PSBR-8 Low temperature moddeling for various projects and assets - Surge calculations to vallidate the operating window for Carbon steel and GRE pipelines. - Methanol optimalisation for the Shear water platform - CO2 Guidelines written to capture learnings from Quest and other CCS projects in and outside Shell
Ask_me_about: Condensate Spiking, liquid management, Multiphase Flow, Hydrates, Slug catcher, Cleaning, Pigging Operation, Pipeline Liquid Management, Pipelines, OLGA, pipesim, pipesim network simulations, Flow Assurance, Pipeline Hydraulics
